prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Drums, Bass, Pipe, Brass, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Drums, Bass, Pipe, and Brass, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Drums, Bass, Pipe, and Brass instruments, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Piano, Drums, Bass, Pipe, and Brass, excluding Guitar.
